description: From Urdu تحصیل دار‎ (taḥṣīl dār), from Persian تحصیلدار‎, from Arabic تَحْصِيل‎ (taḥṣīl), and Persian دار‎ (dâr).

entries.meaning: An administrative officer in Pakistan and India who gathers taxes from a tehsil.
examples: The next day Victor took an architect with him and got the tehsildar to join them.
